# Index
```{r makeData}
analysis <- read_rds("data/analysis.rds") %>% 
  arrange(State_Name, `Days Since the first case (in Mexico)`) 
```


```{r plotIndex}

x <- ggplot() + 
  theme_few(base_size = 25) +
  geom_point(data = analysis, 
             aes(x=`Days Since the first case (in Mexico)`, 
                 y = `Policy Index Adjusted for Time`, group = State_Name)) 

ggplotly(x)

```
